title: nginx安装配置
text: nginx安装[TOC] 一、安装说明系统环境：CentOS Linux release 7.2.1511 (Core)系统内核：3.10.0-327.el7.x86_64软件：nginx-1.10.1.tar.gz其他所需软件：pcre-devel 、openssl-devel 、GeoIP-devel 、zlib-devel安装方式：源码编译安装安装位置：/usr/local/nginx 二、安装前提安装nginx之前，确保系统安装了g++、gcc 1.安装pcre-develrewrite模块需要 pcre 库1$ sudo yum install pcre-devel -y 2.安装openssl-develssl 功能需要openssl库1$ sudo yum install openssl-devel -y 3.安装zlib-develgzip模块需要 zlib 库1$ sudo yum install zlib-devel -y 4.安装GeoIP-devel1$ sudo yum install GeoIP-devel -y 三、安装nginx1.创建用户1# useradd -M -s /sbin/nologin www 2.解压1# tar zxf nginx-1.10.1.tar.gz -C /usr/local/ 3.进入源码包目录1# cd /usr/local/nginx-1.10.1/ 4.配置12345678910111213141516171819202122232425./configure \--user=www \--group=www \--prefix=/usr/local/nginx \--sbin-path=/usr/sbin/nginx \--http-log-path=/var/log/nginx/access.log \--error-log-path=/var/log/nginx/error.log \--http-client-body-temp-path=/var/cache/nginx/client_temp \--http-proxy-temp-path=/var/cache/nginx/proxy_temp \--http-fastcgi-temp-path=/var/cache/nginx/fastcgi_temp \--http-uwsgi-temp-path=/var/cache/nginx/uwsgi_temp \--http-scgi-temp-path=/var/cache/nginx/scgi_temp \--lock-path=/var/lock/nginx.lock \--pid-path=/var/run/nginx.pid \--with-debug \--with-threads \--with-http_ssl_module \--with-http_geoip_module \--with-http_gzip_static_module \--with-http_gunzip_module \--with-http_realip_module \--with-http_secure_link_module \--with-http_sub_module \--with-http_stub_status_module \--with-ipv6 5.编译安装1# make && make install 6.创建目录12# mkdir -pv /var/cache/nginx/client_temp 7.验证12# nginx -V 8.启动、重载启动1# /usr/sbin/nginx 重载1# /usr/sbin/nginx -s reload 9.停止查询nginx主进程号1# ps aux|grep nginx 停止进程1# kill -QUIT 主进程号 快速停止1# kill -TERM 主进程号 强制停止1pkill -9 nginx 10.测试测试端口1# netstat -lnupt|grep 80 四、配置说明1.安装位置1/usr/local/nginx 2.配置文件位置1/usr/local/nginx/conf 3.二进制执行文件1/usr/sbin/nginx
